item.title: 2.1 Examples
item.description:
Section 2.1: Examples

\[ \frac{d}{dx}[x^n] = n \cdot x^{n-1}, \]

where \( n \) can be any real number.

Example 1: Basic Polynomial

Differentiate \( f(x) = x^3 \).

Solution:

\[ f'(x) = 3 \cdot x^{3-1} = 3x^2. \]

Example 2: Fractional Exponent

Differentiate \( g(x) = x^{1/2} \).

Solution:

\[ g'(x) = \frac{1}{2} \cdot x^{\frac{1}{2} - 1} = \frac{1}{2} \cdot x^{-\frac{1}{2}} = \frac{1}{2\sqrt{x}}. \]

Example 3: Negative Exponent

Differentiate \( h(x) = x^{-2} \).

item.title: 2.1 Practice
item.description:
2.1 Power Rule

Ex1.

Differentiate \( f(x) = x^5 \).

Solution \[ f'(x) = 5 \cdot x^{5-1} = 5x^4. \]

Ex2.

Differentiate \( g(x) = x^{1/3} \).

Solution \[ g'(x) = \frac{1}{3} \cdot x^{\frac{1}{3}-1} = \frac{1}{3} \cdot x^{-\frac{2}{3}} = \frac{1}{3\sqrt[3]{x^2}}. \]

Ex3.

Differentiate \( h(x) = x^{-4} \).

Solution \[ h'(x) = -4 \cdot x^{-4-1} = -4x^{-5}. \]

Ex4.

Differentiate \( f(x) = \frac{1}{x^2} \).

Solution \[ f(x) = x^{-2}. \]\[ f'(x) = -2 \cdot x^{-2-1} = -2x^{-3} = \frac{-2}{x^3}. \]

Differentiate \( g(x) = x^{7/2} \).
